publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3702 Stuart McMillan: Council Wins Eco Award—That the Parliament congratulates East Dunbartonshire Council for winning a top award for tackling lunchtime littering around schools; notes that the council was presented with the Best Local Environmental Quality Innovation Award at the annual Scottish People and Places conference held at Dunblane Hydro Hotel; further notes that Turnbull High School in Bishopbriggs delivered a presentation to the conference about the award submission using a video diary, which highlighted pupils’ views about litter, and acknowledges the contribution made by both the council and pupils in tackling the problem of litter around schools in East Dunbartonshire. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Nanette Milne*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3702 Council Wins Eco Award (lodged on 13 March 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-3702 Council Wins Eco Award (lodged on 13 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3702 Council Wins Eco Award (lodged on 13 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
